page.title: 02Ben's day
page.content: On a usual Wednesday,I jump out of my bunk bed at about 7:45 am and go down for a breakfast of Sugar Puffs.When Mum calls I get in the bath,wash and get dried and put on my socks,pants, trousers,shirt and jumper.By now it's about 8:50 am.Ten minutes to school.So I pick up my bag and leave my town house.In school,the first thing is registration and reading.Then we do maths.After a 15 minute break we do group work and story reading as a class.When it's 12:00 pm I go for dinner.I go up to the counter and choose my dinner_let's say a hot dog, beans and ice_cream_eat it,clear the table and go out for break.Afternoon is usually the same as the morning until 3:30 pm when I go home and watch TV until Dad picks me up in his car and takes me to his house where I have dinner and watch TV until bedtime.
